div.p: Indicates the duration of time over which repetitions are to occur; e.g. to express '3 times per day', 3 would be the frequency and '1 day' would be the period. If periodMax is present, this element indicates the lower bound of the allowed range of the period length.

description.value: Indicates the duration of time over which repetitions are to occur; e.g. to express '3 times per day', 3 would be the frequency and '1 day' would be the period. If periodMax is present, this element indicates the lower bound of the allowed range of the period length.

short.value: Decimal representing indicates the duration of time over which repetitions are to occur; e.g. to express '3 times per day', 3 would be the frequency and '1 day' would be the period. If periodMax is present, this element indicates the lower bound of the allowed range of the period length.
